title: Where can someone find information about pursuing a career in the music technology field? - Quora

response.answer_text: The uncomfortable truth is that there are now so few actual jobs in the music industry , and those that have them aren’t going to relinquish them lightly . The music industry is in a totally different stage of existence from the same industry even 10 years ago . I can only suggest thhat you check studios for their work opportunities , and join internet companies that post any new jobs in the creative sector . Don’t expect to find anything that offers a good salary at this time , and be prepared to wait .
